basics.name: Juvy Ann Lucero
basics.label: UH Manoa Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

courses: CSCI Intro to Computer Science I/II

highlights: Processed cash, credit, and return payments
Build a strong relationship with customers to connect on a personal level to understand what they want

volunteer.organization: Student Room Facilitator for Undergraduate Students
volunteer.summary: Help facilitate each booth by making sure that both the student presenters and the attendees feel comfortable with the technology, helping to connect everyone to the proper resource, and creating a comfortable environment to make this event accessible for all of our students. In person volunteers will help with set-up, breakdown, and making sure that the event is running smoothly.
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure

volunteer.summary: A student organization under the Ilokano language & Literature Program at University of Hawai'i at Manoa

awards.title: B2B Award
awards.summary: National Science Foundation Bridges to Baccalaureate: Strategic Alliance for Minority Participation (NSF B2B STAMP TWO) Award.
